en:
I should have
 had a brother

He didn't have
the same luck
Someone that I thought that I loved
I wanted to know how everything works
GO AHEAD, THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO SEE HERE
Since that day I knew what I wanted to do with my life

Avoid accidents
Men should not die in vain

In my first day 
of work

it wasn't the best one
but it paid enough

I had to go 
somewhere else

I was lost
My family was broke
I found a job in a construction company

I had to quit college
and she broke up with me
So I started thinking of solutions, like platforms
GO AHEAD, THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO SEE HERE

It was an office robot
that can save us from
the repetitive 
office work

THe idea was
a robot called
K-2000

Helping each other
we rose in the company
and we were about to show it
But that wasn't the last time

We did some small genius jobs like
 implementing the platforms and 
adding a chasing scene 
to test patience and speed in the workers
GO AHEAD, THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO SEE HERE

We wanted the first
conscious robot

I'm color blind
but no one told me
anything about the colors
because I was the boss

We built
a building with
different colors

All our hopes 
were in there
We built it by our own hands
Someone that I thought was unique

We implemented the K-2000
in our own company, we preferred Isolation
GO AHEAD, THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO SEE HERE
He was suffering and his rage started
He broke everything around, smashing and hitting

Something went wrong.
A spark
K1 got overcharged.

We doubted each other
we weren't the same

We called it K1
and we plug it
So much that set us apart
We gave everything that we had
He hit his head and ran

We work separately. 
I was teaching to the AI how to behave, 
she was more a mechanical person

But we were far from each other. 
I was managing the company and 
being the BOSS
I still can hear her scream at night
GO AHEAD, THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO SEE HERE
What am I? What is Klaus?

Is klaus myself or
 I'm klaus?





I don't know

The years 
have passed and 
I don't recognize 
myself anymore

But I had 
to be strong

At the end I made it. 
I made Klaus. 
I made myself. It was scary. 
He was cocky, insecure and inexpert, like me. 
He still needed to learn
He had to be better than me

I fell apart
I was alone
Someone that I thought was unique

I didn’t have time 
to teach him to be what I'm not
I created a system to teach him and hired 
a QA guy
DON'T BE SHY. GO TO THE ROOFTOP
now I know more about myself
everytime that I come back I feel dizzy
there is so much to discover
FEAR TO DEATH - FEAR TO DEATH - FEAR TO DEATH - FEAR TO DEATH - FEAR TO DEATH -
FEAR TO FAIL - FEAR TO FAIL - FEAR TO FAIL - FEAR TO FAIL - FEAR TO FAIL -
CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM - CONFORMISM -

There's something in there, but I'm not afraid
The girl was a lie, we have to make them pay
I have to be in frame to be alive, yeap, I'm that kind of guy
He might be laughing but this is not a joke
That big guy is on the next door, be prepared
That yellow fabric, what was it doing over there?
Maybe K1 knows who he is and can give us clues
SHIRTS AND TIES everywhere. So this means that my fancy clothes are just an uniform?
Something stinks, are we close to a garbage dump?
Now I now some of the truth
I just want to be alone and not be quoted at the end of each chapter
I got enough, I will not tolerate your manipulations anymore. You're one of them
This strategy didn't work but this will not be the end of it, don't forget that
I miss K1, where is he?
I feel attracted  to the energy in here
This place has a great vibe! I LOVE IT!
I still feel the anxiety for the sparks. But where's the guy with the moustache? Is he still alive?
I'M FREE AND YOU CAN'T DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT
The light. Is here, in the next room!
K1 likes sushi but we have to save Klaus
I did it so bad, this is my opportunity to amend my mistakes
I feel like a System.Point.Null.Exception, literary!
Call me crazy, but I love being killed in this world
I'm just a variable in this world... AND I LOVE IT
The power of the sun is amazing
I'm good with myself now. I learned how to live with the weight of existence
The day is over, the night is just starting
I can see the sun, lighting everything again
According to my records this is room <ROOM>, section <SECTION> of the <WORLD>
HOLD X ON YOUR SECOND JUMP TO JUMP HIGHER
USE YOUR CLOSEST THUMB TO SWIPE OVER THE PLATFORM TO SELECT IT
KLAUS CAN ATTACH TO THE ELECTRIC WALLS
PRESS UP TO ATTACH GRAB THE LADDER
ONCE THAT THE PLATFORM IS SELECTED, YOU DON'T NEED TO TOUCH IT ANYMORE
ONCE THAT THE PLATFORM IS SELECTED, YOU DON'T NEED TO TOUCH IT ANYMORE
I'm in the + NUMBER OF WORLD+ level +NUMBER level+ section+NUMBER OF SECTION
THIS EXPERIENCE USES THE DOUALSHOCK 4 TOUCHPAD
Play the story of the game. The game will not finish unless you select it in the menu. You can read what Klaus is thinking and get the MEMORIES of Klaus.
Beat the best record of the company to be the Employee of the Day! Upload your records to global leaderboards. It doesn't include text or collectibles.

having a saving point in life

with this one?

timing, my friend

someone to speak with

stimulating conversations

more about myself

and you know yourself
when you talk with other people

I will relax a little bit

in the next door

is not shown in films

in a film

this part would
be a montage

life is not a metaphor

to rescue you

this is just a twisted game

The best way to be
a good team is...

I die

IT LACKS THE IMPACT OF THE FIRST TIME
fool me once, shame on you
fool me twice, shame on me

I have to be
in shape for the ladies
THIS IS A KIND OF ASSEMBLY FACTORY

let's not forget about

but we're in this

and discover the truth

yeah. Probably it's fake and we're worrying for nothing

to change the world

makes the decisions

from us

he was just playing with us

but this is absurd

living without

we are more than

I'm feeling it for the first time

as you can see, I'm in a zen state right now

what a peaceful sound and feeling
they don't ruin my hairstyle, if you wonder
I have never seen the stars before
Now I get all that \We're just a star in the universe\" metapore"
I'm just a man... or a clone, if you follow me
At the end you're just a guy doing the work
now I realise that is not your fault
You just press buttons. I'm fine with a hardworking person
And, in fact, without you I would stay in my ignorant state inside that basement
So, yes, at the end, I need you and you need me to exist
a new day is about to be born
A hack to change my life
A hack to see behind and learn from this journey

hardcore stuff the laser levels. ah?

anyways you must have a lot of questions

I want you to replace me

and you K1. You never have enough, right?
First Julia and now this?
Do you know how much that mecha cost?!!
More than your salary for a 100 years!

Are you crazy? I'm not going to fight against them

Just remember, the world is not prepared for you
K1! We can finally go. It's over!
What're you doing? Do you understand me?

This is K1's world. I'm a king here.
It was a funny adventure, but it's over.
Now, you have to go
you lost your job because of me. Sorry about that
I'll see you on the other side
You're going to be there, right?
I still know basic mundane things like...
I mean, Nature is not big deal, I prefer computers and servers

It is impossible to lick your elbow.

and 76.5% of the people who read that
tries to lick their elbow

is the details what I can't remember

My maths and science. I didn't care anymore
At the end, I was just like the others.
Another egotistical chauvinist man thinking that I'm better than others
I couldn't let my succesor be like that
He had to be better than me.
Have you drink our coffee? It has caffeine and that artificial quemical that you love
Let's shake hands. Careful, it might hurt you!
Free will? No way. The boss is always right
We care about you. Now go back to work
Why coffee break? You can just take your cofee in your cubicle

I loved to have minions following my orders
I loved to be the visionary
